message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your life.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you're willing to negotiate. I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider that?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand you're looking to spend closer to $10,000, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $10,800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway.  I'm still hoping to get the price down a little closer to my target. Would you consider $10,500?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to get the price down, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $10,800. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium warranty and a personalized setup service, which is usually worth $500. This will bring the total value to $11,300. I think this is a great offer, and I'm willing to consider it.
